heading: UNifayi wenza amaqela amabini eembali—Iyileyo ibizwa ngokuba ngamacwecwe kaNifayi—Amakhulu amacwecwe aqulathe imbali yezehlabathi; awona mancinane aphathelene okokuqala nezinto ezingcwele. Malunga 600–592 P.K.

verses.txt: Kwaye ubawo wazibona, kwaye waziva, kwaye wazithetha zonke ezi zinto, ngethuba ehleli ententeni, kwintlambo kaLemuweli, kwanazo ezinye izinto ezinkulu nezininzi ngakumbi endingenako ukuzibhala phezu kwala macwecwe.

Kwaye ngoku, njengoko sendithethile ngokunxulumene nala macwecwe, qaphela asingawo amacwecwe endenza phezu kwawo ingxelo epheleleyo yembali yabantu bam; kuba amacwecwe endenza phezu kwawo ingxelo epheleleyo yabantu bam ndiwanika igama likaNifayi; ngako oko, abizwa ngokuba ngamacwecwe kaNifayi, abizwa ngegama lam; kwaye la macwecwe kanjalo abizwa ngokuba ngamacwecwe kaNifayi.
Nangona kunjalo, ndifumene umyalelo eNkosini okokuba kufuneka ndenze la macwecwe, ngenjongo ekhethekileyo yokuba kubekho ingxelo ekroliweyo yobulungiseleli babantu bam.

Phezu kwamanye amacwecwe kufanele kukrolwe ingxelo yolawulo lookumkani, neemfazwe neembambano zabantu bam; ngako oko la macwecwe aphathelele ngokungakumbi nobulungiseleli; kwaye amanye amacwecwe aphathelele ngokungakumbi nolawulo lookumkani neemfazwe neembambano zabantu bam.
Ngako oko, iNkosi indiyalele ukuba ndenze la macwecwe ngobulumko obukuyo, injongo leyo endingayaziyo.

Kodwa yona iNkosi yazi zonke izinto ukusuka ekuqalekeni; ngako oko, iyayilungiselela indlela yokuphumeza yonke imisebenzi yayo phakathi kwabantwana babantu; kuba qaphelani, inawo onke amandla ukuze iwazalisekise onke amazwi ayo. Kwaye kunjalo. Amen.
